text: The 2015 Ottawa Fury FC season was the club's second season at the professional level in the North American Soccer League. ==Club== ===Staff=== Marc Dos Santos and other staff members would retain their positions from the previous season. Shortly after the conclusion of the 2014 season, the club announced the addition of longtime Chelsea academy coach Darko Buser to the club's management team. ===Roster changes=== On November 26, 2014, the club announced it would release four players; defenders Ramón Soria and Kenny Caceros, as well as forwards Pierre-Rudolph Mayard and Vini Dantas.
